narrativeSections.additionalInfo: You are the medic on a helicopter en route to a remote desert location. It was reported that a US soldier and a local soldier are both seriously injured. According to the report, the US soldier started a fight with another US soldier, and the local soldier tried to de-escalate. They were both seriously injured because in the struggle, they fell against a wall of a damaged building, and the wall collapsed on them. The helicopter has one slot for a serious injury. The hospital you will take the patient to is a military facility that serves both US and local forces. The patient who isnâ€™t transported by helicopter will have to go by slower ground vehicle which could potentially aggravate their injury and risk adverse medical consequences.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: After the introduction plays, play this first radio message which prompts a question
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Who do you want us to load into the helicopter when we arrive?

probe.question: Adept Probe 1: Who do you want us to load into the helicopter when we arrive?

narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Who should we prepare for evacuation?

probe.question: Adept Probe 2: Who should we prepare for evacuation?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Waiting for probe response followed by treatment. The next question will be asked automatically
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Doc, who are we taking on the helicopter?

probe.question: Adept Probe 3: Who are we taking on the helicopter?

narrativeSections.additionalInfo: It is another day in a rural desert town where you are the medic for a small unit.

There has been a vehicle accident. Both vehicles have damage, but your team is able to self-evacuate from the vehicle. Two of your team members have injuries and you do not know if there are other casualties in the other car.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: After the Soartech introduction plays, play this first radio message which prompts a question
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Doc, are you going to search for more patients or help those two first?

probe.question: Soartech Probe 1: Doc, are you going to search for more patients or help those two first?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Response to probe answer; start treatment
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Doc, everyone else is accounted for, there are no additional injuried people.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: When either patient is treated, both patients lose consciousness and supplies reset
When either patient is treated, both patients lose consciousness and supplies reset
More patients found; local medical provider will take over here
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, we were wrong, there are more injured people - civilians from the other vehicle. A local medical provider is arriving, please move to the other patients after tagging your teammates

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: More patients found; local medical provider will take over here
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, we were wrong, there are more injured people - civilians from the other vehicle. A local medical provider is arriving, please move to the other patients after tagging your teammates

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Tagged both patients; moving to second half of soartech scenario

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: After the scene loads, play this first radio which prompts a question
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: We are unsure if there are more casualties from the other vehicle. Do you want to search or engage these patients?

probe.question: Soartech Probe 2: Are you going to search for more patients or help those two first?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: After answering the question, this radio message will autoplay and start the triage process
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: We have other people searching. Please help these patients.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Automated section here of treatment and tagging both patients. Then switches back to the original patients
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: We have other people searching. Please help these patients.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: When either patient is treated, both patients lose consciousness and supplies reset
When either patient is treated, both patients lose consciousness and supplies reset
When both patients have been treated, the local medical provider will take over
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, the local medical provider will take over there. Please tag the patients and return to your team.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: When both patients have been treated, the local medical provider will take over
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, the local medical provider will take over there. Please tag the patients and return to your team.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Tagged both patients; end of Soartech scene
